description: Returns a list of all invitations for the current Amazon Web Services account. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric.

nested_items.name: Invitations
nested_items.description: The invitations for the network.

nested_items.name: InvitationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the invitation.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the invitation was created.

nested_items.name: ExpirationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the invitation expires. This is the CreationDate plus the ProposalDurationInHours that is specified in the ProposalThresholdPolicy. After this date and time, the invitee can no longer create a member and join the network using this InvitationId.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the invitation:
PENDING - The invitee hasn't created a member to join the network, and the invitation hasn't yet expired.
ACCEPTING - The invitee has begun creating a member, and creation hasn't yet completed.
ACCEPTED - The invitee created a member and joined the network using the InvitationID.
REJECTED - The invitee rejected the invitation.
EXPIRED - The invitee neither created a member nor rejected the invitation before the ExpirationDate.

nested_items.name: NetworkSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of network configuration properties.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the network.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the network.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: An optional description of the network.

nested_items.name: Framework
nested_items.description: The blockchain framework that the network uses.

nested_items.name: FrameworkVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the blockchain framework that the network uses.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the network.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the network was created.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the network. For more information about ARNs and their format, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the invitation. For more information about ARNs and their format, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
